activities: Depart from Chicago O'Hare (ORD) for Malé (MLE), Maldives. Overnight flight with Turkish Airlines.
Continue flight journey. Arrive at Velana International Airport (MLE) in Malé, Maldives (20:55 UTC). Overnight stay near MLE airport due to late arrival and daylight-only resort transfers.

Morning domestic transfer (estimated cost included in flight total) from MLE to Maamigili (VAM) by flight, followed by a short speedboat transfer to Dhigurah. Check-in to Mala Boutique Inn Maldives. Relax and prepare for diving.
Dive day 1: Discover local dive sites around Dhigurah, orientation dives with South Ari Dive.
Dive day 2: Morning dive excursion to search for whale sharks in the South Ari Atoll Marine Protected Area. Afternoon reef dive.
Dive day 3: Morning dive to maximize chances of whale shark encounters. Afternoon relaxation or beach activities.
Dive day 4: Two-tank dive excursion, exploring vibrant coral reefs and potential manta ray sightings.
Dive day 5: Morning dive targeting whale shark hotspots. Enjoy evening at the resort.
Dive day 6: Explore new dive sites near Dhigurah, known for diverse marine life.
Dive day 7: Another morning dive dedicated to whale shark searching. Afternoon leisure.
Dive day 8: Two-tank dive focusing on drift dives or channel dives.
Last day for diving or snorkeling. Enjoy the resort amenities. Ensure no-fly time after diving before departure.

Check-out from Mala Boutique Inn Maldives. Morning domestic transfer from Dhigurah to Velana International Airport (MLE). Depart from MLE for Chicago O'Hare (ORD) with Turkish Airlines (19:40 UTC departure).
Arrive back at Chicago O'Hare (ORD) in the afternoon.
